title: Review ISO 9001 Documentation
description: As part of a quality audit, an auditor reviews the documentation for the company's ISO 9001 certified Quality Management System (QMS).

tasks.description: Review the QMS manual to ensure it has been reviewed and approved by management within the last year, as required.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor confirms the manual was last updated 18 months ago, which is a non-conformance.

tasks.description: Review the records from the last management review meeting to ensure all required topics were covered.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor verifies the meeting minutes are complete and compliant.

tasks.description: Review the corrective action log to ensure that all previously identified non-conformances have been addressed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor finds two corrective actions that are past their due date.
